children.name: This Privacy Policy describes how Pushbio Inc. and our subsidiaries and affiliates (collectively “Pushbio,” “we”, “us” or “our”) handle personal information that we collect through our digital properties that link to this Privacy Policy (collectively, the “Service”), as well as through social media, our marketing activities, and other activities described in this Privacy Policy.

Pushbio provides a platform for creators to build and manage their online presence. We offer tools for creating customizable bio pages, managing links, selling digital products, discover brands, and engaging with audiences across various platforms.
Personal information you may provide to us through the Service or otherwise includes:
• Contact data, such as your first and last name, email address.
, such as your first and last name, email address.
• Account data, such as your username and password that you set to establish an online account with us, as well as other information you choose to include in your account profile.
, such as your username and password that you set to establish an online account with us, as well as other information you choose to include in your account profile.
• Content, including any text, images, videos, or other content you upload to the Service.
, including any text, images, videos, or other content you upload to the Service.
• Communication data, including messages you send to us or that we exchange through the Service.
, including messages you send to us or that we exchange through the Service.
• Payment and transaction data, such as payment card information, billing information, and purchase history.
, such as payment card information, billing information, and purchase history.
• Marketing data, such as your preferences for receiving communications about our products, services, and events.
, such as your preferences for receiving communications about our products, services, and events.
• Social media data, such as information from your connected social media accounts when you choose to link them to our Service.
, such as information from your connected social media accounts when you choose to link them to our Service.
We, our service providers, and our business partners may automatically log information about you, your computer or mobile device, and your interaction with our Service, including:

• Device data, such as your computer or mobile device’s operating system type and version, manufacturer and model, browser type, screen resolution, RAM and disk size, CPU usage, device type, IP address, unique identifiers, language settings, mobile device carrier, and general location information (such as city or area).

, such as your computer or mobile device’s operating system type and version, manufacturer and model, browser type, screen resolution, RAM and disk size, CPU usage, device type, IP address, unique identifiers, language settings, mobile device carrier, and general location information (such as city or area).

• Online activity data, such as pages or screens you viewed, how long you spent on a page or screen, navigation paths between pages or screens, information about your activity on a page or screen, access times, and duration of access.

, such as pages or screens you viewed, how long you spent on a page or screen, navigation paths between pages or screens, information about your activity on a page or screen, access times, and duration of access.

We may use cookies, local storage, and similar technologies to automatically collect this information. For more information about these technologies, please see the Cookies and Similar Technologies section below.
How we use your personal information
How we use your personal information
We use your personal information for the following purposes or as otherwise described at the time of collection:
• Provide, operate and improve the Service and our business
Provide, operate and improve the Service and our business
• Communicate with you about the Service
Communicate with you about the Service
• Provide customer support and respond to your requests and inquiries
Provide customer support and respond to your requests and inquiries
• Personalize your experience with the Service
Personalize your experience with the Service
• Integrate content and functionality from third-party platforms you choose to connect
Integrate content and functionality from third-party platforms you choose to connect
We may use your personal information for research and development purposes, including to analyze and improve the Service and our business.
We may use your personal information to send you Pushbio-related marketing communications and to display advertisements to you.
We may use your personal information to:
• Comply with applicable laws, lawful requests, and legal processes
Comply with applicable laws, lawful requests, and legal processes
• Protect our, your, or others’ rights, privacy, safety, or property
Protect our, your, or others’ rights, privacy, safety, or property
• Enforce our terms of service and other agreements
Enforce our terms of service and other agreements
How we share your personal information
How we share your personal information
We may share your personal information with:
• Service providers that help us operate and improve our business and the Service
that help us operate and improve our business and the Service
• Payment processors to process your payments
• Advertising partners to display advertisements to you
• Professional advisors, such as lawyers and accountants, where necessary
, such as lawyers and accountants, where necessary
• Authorities and others, when required by law or to protect rights and safety
, when required by law or to protect rights and safety
• Business transferees, in the event of a merger, sale, or other business transfer
, in the event of a merger, sale, or other business transfer
• Third-party platforms, when you choose to connect your Pushbio account with these platforms
, when you choose to connect your Pushbio account with these platforms
We use APIs from various third-party platforms to enhance our Service, provide you with additional functionality, and enable login capabilities. These include:
We use Google oauth and YouTube API Services to login to our website and display your Youtube channel analytics. We adhere to YouTube’s Terms of Service (
). By using our Service, you are also agreeing to be bound by the YouTube Terms of Service.

We do not use data obtained through Google Workspace APIs to develop, improve, or train generalized AI or machine learning models. All data collected is used solely for the purpose of providing the services explicitly described in our application.
Retention and Deletion of Google User Data

We retain Google user data only for as long as necessary to provide our services and fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. Users have the option to delete their data by deleting their Pushbio account, which will result in the removal of all associated Google-linked data from our systems. Additionally, users may revoke our access to their Google account through their Google account settings, after which we will no longer have access to their data and will remove any associated stored data in accordance with our retention policies.
We integrate with Facebook’s API to allow you to connect your Facebook account and share your page or Instagram account analytics. This integration is subject to Facebook’s Data Policy (
Our Service uses the Twitter API to enable Twitter-related features. Use of Twitter’s services is subject to the Twitter Privacy Policy (
We use LinkedIn’s API to login to our Service with your Linkedin account. This integration is governed by LinkedIn’s Privacy Policy (

We integrate with TikTok’s API to allow you to log in to our product using your TikTok account and to display your TikTok profile analytics on your mediakit. This integration is subject to TikTok’s Privacy Policy (

Our Service uses the Pinterest API to enable Pinterest-related features, including login capabilities and displaying your Pinterest profile analytics on your mediakit. Use of Pinterest’s services is subject to the Pinterest Privacy Policy (

We integrate with Twitch’s API to allow you to log in to our product using your Twitch account and to display your Twitch profile analytics on your mediakit. This integration is governed by Twitch’s Privacy Policy (
1. We only access the information you explicitly authorize us to access when you connect your accounts.
We only access the information you explicitly authorize us to access when you connect your accounts.
2. We use this information solely for the purpose of providing and improving our Service.
We use this information solely for the purpose of providing and improving our Service.
3. We do not sell or rent this information to third parties.
We do not sell or rent this information to third parties.
4. You can revoke our access to your data from these platforms at any time through your account settings on our Service or directly on the respective platform.
You can revoke our access to your data from these platforms at any time through your account settings on our Service or directly on the respective platform.

Our Service integrates with Zoom to enhance your experience. By connecting your Zoom account, you consent to our access and use of certain information from your Zoom profile, including your name, email address, and meeting details. This information is used solely to facilitate the integration and provide you with seamless functionality.

We do not share your Zoom information with third parties, except as necessary to provide the Service or as required by law. For more information on how Zoom handles your data, please refer to Zoom’s Privacy Statement. (
By using the Zoom integration, you agree to the collection and use of your information as outlined in this section. If you do not agree, please refrain from using the Zoom integration features.
You have several choices regarding your personal information:
• Access or update your information: You can access and update certain account information from your account settings.
: You can access and update certain account information from your account settings.
• Opt-out of marketing communications: You can opt-out of marketing-related emails by following the instructions in the email or contacting us.
: You can opt-out of marketing-related emails by following the instructions in the email or contacting us.
• Cookies: Most browsers allow you to adjust cookie settings. Please note that blocking certain cookies may impact the functionality of our Service.
: Most browsers allow you to adjust cookie settings. Please note that blocking certain cookies may impact the functionality of our Service.
• Third-party connections: You can choose to disconnect your account from third-party platforms at any time through your account settings.
: You can choose to disconnect your account from third-party platforms at any time through your account settings.
The Service may contain links to third-party websites and services. We are not responsible for the practices of these third parties, and we encourage you to review their privacy policies.

We employ technical, administrative, and physical safeguards designed to protect personal information. However, no security measures are perfect, and we cannot guarantee the security of your information.

We are headquartered in the United States and may transfer your personal information to countries with different data protection laws. We will take appropriate measures to protect your personal information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

The Service is not intended for use by children under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under 16, we will delete it.

We may modify this Privacy Policy at any time. If we make material changes, we will notify you by updating the effective date and posting the modified version on our Service. Your continued use of the Service after the effective date of a modified Privacy Policy indicates your acceptance of the modified Policy.
For questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:
